verses.text: The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* my \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*; I shall not \w want|strong="H2637"\w*.

He maketh me to lie \w down|strong="H7257"\w* in \w green|strong="H1877"\w* \w pastures|strong="H4999"\w*: he \w leadeth|strong="H5095"\w* me beside the \w still|strong="H4496"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.\f + \fr 23.2 \ft green…: Heb. pastures of tender grass\f*\f + \fr 23.2 \ft still…: Heb. waters of quietness\f*

He \w restoreth|strong="H7725"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: he \w leadeth|strong="H5148"\w* me in the \w paths|strong="H4570"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* for his \w name’s|strong="H8034"\w* sake.

Yea, though I \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* through the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of the shadow of \w death|strong="H6757"\w*, I will \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* no \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: for thou \add art\add* with me; thy \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* and thy \w staff|strong="H4938"\w* they \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* me.

Thou \w preparest|strong="H6186"\w* a \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me in the presence of mine \w enemies|strong="H6887"\w*: thou \w anointest|strong="H1878"\w* my \w head|strong="H7218"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*; my \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* runneth \w over|strong="H7310"\w*.\f + \fr 23.5 \ft anointest: Heb. makest fat\f*

Surely \w goodness|strong="H2896"\w* and \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* shall \w follow|strong="H7291"\w* me all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of my \w life|strong="H2416"\w*: and I will \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* for \w ever|strong="H0753"\w*.\f + \fr 23.6 \ft for ever: Heb. to length of days\f*
